meanings.definition: A photograph taken by an early photographic process employing an iodine-sensitized silvered plate and mercury vapor.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed beautiful daguerreotypes of old buildings.
meanings.sent2: She treasured the family daguerreotypes passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The daguerreotypes on the wall seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like daguerreotypes, frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The daguerreotypes captured moments that would otherwise be lost.

meanings.definition: To take a photograph using the daguerreotype process.
meanings.sent1: He learned how to daguerreotype to preserve memories.
meanings.sent2: She daguerreotypes landscapes to showcase their beauty.
meanings.sent3: In a rush, he tried to daguerreotype his lunch for fun.
meanings.sent4: She daguerreotyped the scene with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: Daguerreotyping allowed him to freeze time in a single frame.
